STIG Manager Requirements and Dependencies¶

STIG Manager is under active development. Only the latest release will be supported. If you experience any problems, we encourage you to make sure you are running the latest release before creating an issue.

Requirements¶

Software Requirements¶

  • Node.js 14+

  • mySql 8.0.14+

  • RedHat Keycloak 11+

Tested with:

  • Docker 20.10.2

  • NodeJs provided by node:lts-alpine image on Docker Hub

  • MySQL provided by mysql:latest image on Docker Hub

Hardware Requirements¶

Relatively lightweight, but hardware requirements are still being determined.

Dependencies¶

Please see the package-lock.json file in our repo.
